title: Number of Starwood Hotels and Resorts hotels worldwide 2009 to 2015
summary: Overall Number of hotels has increased over the Year.
Number of hotels is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2014.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Number of hotels, of value 1161.0 was reached at Year 2014
The lowest Number of hotels, of value 979.0 was reported at Year 2010
